column2:
"Thanks!
Hmm, just as I heard. It's really light, but
it's also really hard and sturdy."

"Now, to get this made into a cooking utensil
right away. I mustn't keep my customers waiting."

"Oh, but I mustn't forget your reward, either.
Here you go. Gotta run, bye!"

"ありがとう！
へー、聞いた通りね。すごい軽い
けど、すっごい硬くて頑丈そう。"

"よーし、早くこれを
調理器具に加工してもらわないと！
お客さんも待ってるしね！"

"そうそう、お礼も渡さなきゃ……
じゃあ、またね！"
